author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Top news of the day: India says lockdown reduced doubling rate of coronavirus cases; two militants killed in J&K encounter, and more
description: The major news headlines of the day, and more.
content: Before lockdown, the doubling rate of coronavirus cases was three days. Going by the number of cases in the last seven days, the doubling rate has been 6.2 days. In 19 States and Union Territories the doubling rate is less than the national average, Lav Agarw… [+2363 chars]
